channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dave Matthews Band 2025 Summer Tour: How to Get Last-Minute Tickets
item.description: 🎶 Score last-minute tickets to the ultimate summer jam with the Dave Matthews Band! Let's make some memories together! 🌞 #DaveMatthewsBand #SummerTour

item.title: Britney Spears Admits to Lighting a Cigarette on a Flight, Apologizes
item.description: Oops, she did it again! 🚬 Britney Spears lights up on a plane and apologizes. #FreeBritney 💁‍♀️✈️

item.title: Peter Buck & Barrett Martin Launch Another Supergroup Drink The Sea: Hear “Outside Again”
item.description: Cheers to the ultimate collab! 🎸🌊 Get ready to vibe with Drink The Sea's "Outside Again." 🎶 #SupergroupMagic

item.title: See Justin Bieber Join SZA for Surprise ‘Snooze’ Performance in Los Angeles
item.description: 🎉 Justin Bieber brings the heat with a surprise 'Snooze' performance alongside SZA in LA! 🔥 #musicnews #JustinBieber #SZA

item.title: Neil Young Plays His “Favorite” Deep Cut For The First Time In 42 Years At Ontario School Benefit
item.description: 🎸 Neil Young surprises fans with a rare gem! 🌟 Witness history at Ontario School Benefit show. #NeilYoung #MusicLegend
